LAST_REMOVED_MARKINGS_ON.description: Last date on which the changes in items were accepted, ex: 2016-03-31T15:13:57.385Z

SESSION_ID.description: Id of the user who started the task

PARAMETERS.description: parameters of the task; could be formated as JSON in order to put multiple key-value pairs.

STATUS.description: the current status of the task

PROGRESS_STEP.description: current progress step of the task

PROGRESS_TOTAL.description: total amount of steps to complete the task

STARTED.description: Timestamp when the task was started the first time in UTC; if the task was not started yet, the value is null

LAST_UPDATED_ON.description: Timestamp when the task status or progress received the last update in UTC; if the task was not started yet, the value is null

ERROR_CODE.description: the code of the error in case the task status is "failed"
